26-year-old.context: The patient is a 26-year-old white female with longstanding nasal obstruction.

white female.context: The patient is a 26-year-old white female with longstanding nasal obstruction.

nasal obstruction.context: The patient is a 26-year-old white female with longstanding nasal obstruction.

deviated nasal septum.context: 1. Nasal obstruction secondary to deviated nasal septum.

cosmetic rhinoplasty.context: Procedure: Cosmetic rhinoplasty. Request for cosmetic change in the external appearance of the nose.

nasal septum straightened.context: First we are going to straighten the nasal septum and reduce the size of the turbinates and then we will also take down the hump, rotate the tip of the nose, and de-project the nasal tip.

turbinate size reduced.context: First we are going to straighten the nasal septum and reduce the size of the turbinates and then we will also take down the hump, rotate the tip of the nose, and de-project the nasal tip.

hump taken down.context: First we are going to straighten the nasal septum and reduce the size of the turbinates and then we will also take down the hump, rotate the tip of the nose, and de-project the nasal tip.

tip rotated.context: First we are going to straighten the nasal septum and reduce the size of the turbinates and then we will also take down the hump, rotate the tip of the nose, and de-project the nasal tip.

tip de-projected.context: First we are going to straighten the nasal septum and reduce the size of the turbinates and then we will also take down the hump, rotate the tip of the nose, and de-project the nasal tip.

left hemitransfixion incision.context: Procedure began with a left hemitransfixion incision, which was brought down into the left intercartilaginous incision.

right intercartilaginous incision.context: Right intercartilaginous incision was also made and the dorsum of the nose was elevated in the submucoperichondrial and subperiosteal plane.

dorsum elevated.context: Right intercartilaginous incision was also made and the dorsum of the nose was elevated in the submucoperichondrial and subperiosteal plane.

septum corrected.context: Intact bilateral septomucoperichondrial flaps were elevated and a severe left-sided nasal septal deviation was corrected by detachment of the caudal nasal septum from the maxillary crest in a swinging door fashion and placing it back into the midline.

turbinate clamped.context: Anterior and inferior one-third of each inferior turbinate was clamped, cut, and resected.

turbinate resected.context: Anterior and inferior one-third of each inferior turbinate was clamped, cut, and resected.

hump lowered.context: The bony hump of the nose was lowered with a straight osteotome by 4 mm.

medial osteotomies.context: Fading medial osteotomies were carried out and lateral osteotomies were then created in order to narrow the bony width of the nose.

lateral osteotomies.context: Fading medial osteotomies were carried out and lateral osteotomies were then created in order to narrow the bony width of the nose.

tip addressed.context: The tip of the nose was then addressed via a retrograde dissection and removal of cephalic caudal semicircle cartilage medially at the tip.

caudal septum shortened.context: The caudal septum was shortened by 2 mm in an angle in order to enhance rotation.

medial crural footplates reattached.context: Medial crural footplates were reattached to the caudal nasal septum with a projection rotation control suture of #3-0 chromic.

upper lateral cartilages rejoined.context: The upper lateral cartilages were rejoined to the dorsal septum with a #4-0 plain gut suture.

mucoperichondrial flaps closed.context: Intact mucoperichondrial flaps were closed with 4-0 plain gut suture.

Doyle nasal splints applied.context: Doyle nasal splints were placed on either side of the nasal septum.

middle meatus filled.context: The middle meatus was filled with Surgicel and Cortisporin otic.

external Denver splint applied.context: External Denver splint was applied with sterile tape and Mastisol.

excellent aesthetic and functional resul.context: Excellent aesthetic and functional results were thus obtained and the patient was awakened in the operating room, taken to the recovery room in good condition.
